website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Cell Surin 2 Matte was regarded as comfortable and stylish training footwear. Other features that received a positive response included its arch support, lightweight nature, and reasonable price. Though many liked the shoe's snug fit, some complained about needing a break-in period. But in the end, it’s all-around characteristic and comfort were enough for owners to recommend them to their peers.
pros: A majority of the consumers were delighted with the comfort offered by the Puma Cell Surin 2 Matte
The style and color combination of the footgear pleased many purchasers
The shoe was considered to be very versatile by numerous reviewers as it can be worn for work, casual walks, short runs, and workouts
A handful of testers were satisfied with the arch support on this model
The product was reasonably priced, said a few shoppers
Some buyers liked its lightweight construction
A couple of individuals were contented with the ventilation of the upper
cons: A few owners griped that the trainer needed breaking-in for it to be comfortable to use
The durability of the footwear was dissatisfactory said some users as it started to fall apart in just one month of regular use
A couple of people disliked the squishy insert because it made their foot slip inside

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered the black on black version and they look great in person
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black on black version and they look great in person. The quality seems to be very good, as expected from Puma, and the foam insert(not mentioned in the listing here) adds a bit of extra comfort. I tend to buy mesh shoes for maximum breathability, but so far I have been pretty happy with the ventilation these do manage to provide. My only issue is that they definitely run small, even compared to the Pumas they replaced. I would suggest going a full size up from what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: smib

customer_reviews.title: OK shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are reasonably comfortable, but even though they are sold as athletic shoes, they are more akin to dress shoes in a cross-trainer shell. I am able to walk in them and as a walking shoe they are comfortable, but I would probably have sore feet if I tried running in them. The provided image says the shoe is synthetic with rubber soles and looks like that synthetic rubberized material in the pictures. Most of the surface is in fact some kind of woven cloth-like material. It doesn't really detract from the look, it's just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haymond

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe, but a bit too small and bit too narrow
customer_reviews.text: t looks very nice, Its a bit narrow compared to other sneakers. I ordered a size 10.5 it was a bit small. i tried to get a 11 but they didnt have it available in that size. I had to return and order a different pair of Puma sneakers, which fits nicely. The style and quality looked/felt nice. However, you might want to order a size bigger. ex: if you are a 10 you might want to get a 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe & quality seems fine. However, unlike other Puma shoes that I have that fit as expected, this shoe is ridiculously tight in front of the arch. I wear a 10 to 10.5 (depending on the shoe). The 10 is fine in length, but the tightness was literally putting my feet to sleep. I bumped up to a 10.5 and it did help, but is still pretty tight. I am working on stretching out the shoe because I really like the design. Time will tell if I will be able to wear these or if they will end up in my donation pile...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, good looking tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable as all Puma tennis shoes are for me. A classy charcoal black with cool bright orange highlights for the Puma logo and on the sole. Good support and comfort with the SoftFoam sole. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Check your foot width first
customer_reviews.text: I do not have wide feet, 9.5" circumference at the widest point on the ball of my foot. I normally wear an 11, but can sometimes make 10.5 work. But these were wayyy too tight. I'm hoping going up a half size will work. But they look great and like they're high quality. I wish they fit. I'm not sure what a fair rating is considering I would like them fine if the sizings were standard.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Sunerson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice inexpensive shoe...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice n fit as expected. If you haven't tried a pair of Puma tennis shoes they are a bit narrower than any other brand of shoe with me knowing this I ordered a 1/2 size larger than normal an I really like these shoes and they are inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to find!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these shoes for my boyfriend for like a year. They look great and it's a true matte black and BRIGHT orange login.
customer_reviews.author: Dara M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This Is my second pair. I wear them to work every day. I work outside and I am on my feet all day. Good look and very comfortable. Would buy it again..
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price on a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after trying them on in a local store and finding them $30 cheaper on Amazon. They arrived quickly and in a box that was in great shape. They were exactly what I expected and they are very comfortable. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TxGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Traction
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair I have purchased. I use primarily for HIIT workouts, especially plyometric and cardio. These shoes have excellent traction and grip the floor well. Last pair gave out after one of the lace eyelets ripped out after about 2 years of twice weekly usage. Of my 6 pairs of different brands of workout footwear, these offer the best traction.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Pecsenye

customer_reviews.title: funny part about it I brought a red and white ... and these fit fine
customer_reviews.text: funny part about it I brought a red and white pair and the fit so good I got the black pair and have to send them back they too tight and too small same size so that kind of bother me 2nd pair still seem tight but I am keeping hope I can break them in and they are a larger size don't get it :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are very nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my every day usage, had the same type but black, gray and red, those got torn up after wearing them for a year every day, I bought them again but in gray, black and orange and I'm happy with my purchase, they're comfortable and have good ankle support, foam insole, the only thing it wasn't 10.5w, but once they're broken in they'll feel like the ones I replaced. overall very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: carlos lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight at the bridge initially but they will break in. Second pair! Wish you could buy the Puma inserts!
customer_reviews.author: NCPG

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they felt cheaply made. Stiff outer material was not a good feel and looked like it would fall apart too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect walking and running shoe for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Love Puma shoes as the ARE a bit narrow, and that’s EXACTLY what I need in a running/walk shoe. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: They look soo cool, great combination of grey and orange. My husband love them
customer_reviews.author: natacha casanova

customer_reviews.title: Love the look & simplicity of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the look & simplicity of these shoes. Feel great, look good & easy on the pocket; this is the kind of shoe I can get behind. I float between an 11.5 & a 12 (varies on brand) and I've found that I'm a 12 in puma's whereas I'm a 11.5 in Adidas & Reebok
customer_reviews.author: Craig Walker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband really liked them, said they're just a little snug around toes but fine
customer_reviews.author: Yuli C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Great fit. Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Fit great. And more form then some of the more "mesh" sneakers I have had.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the look but they are a bit too narrow across the toes and become uncomfortable after having them on for several hours. Not good for walking as toes begin to numb but of course this is my foot 8.5 D.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work fo getter
customer_reviews.text: Loved this show so much bought it again, might be a trend it’s so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: If you a wide foot they will fit Tight
customer_reviews.text: Great kicks a little small for my foot but I got a stretcher and now they fit good
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but too narrow, and seemingly too undersized. I'd recommend you try them on at a store first
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, but waaaaaay too narrow. I don't have very wide feet, but these weren't even close to fitting, even at a full size larger than my normal shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Russel A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: other than that its a really comfortable and nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: A hair tight in the width and i take a normal size, not wide. other than that its a really comfortable and nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable but a bit tight (narrow)
customer_reviews.text: I use them as a second pair of shoes, more as a casual shoe. They are comfortable but a bit tight (narrow). Would've been better off purchasing New Balance (width options).
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Order larger than usual
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of puma's that are a sice 10 amd are kinda snugg so i figured a 10.5 qould be perfect but they are even smaller than my 10s...
customer_reviews.author: Bills85

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Was never able to wear them because the first time i put them on the small loop that the strings go through broke.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Vollmar

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Puma never disappoints!! I couldn't wait for this shoe to be restocked. The fit is great and very comfortable and the colors are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, however the back of the shoe (that rubs ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, however the back of the shoe (that rubs against the Achilles tendon) wore out pretty quickly. Fit is the same as other Puma shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Briggity Brent

customer_reviews.title: Amazon never let you down
customer_reviews.text: It's hard not being able to I am on keep your mind till they get here Joey from the back of your mind they fit grade
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality finish, I expect these to last a ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality finish, I expect these to last a while. I'll update my review at a later date once they have some time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: SoapnWater

customer_reviews.title: fit great very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: fit great very comfortable . on concrete all night and no pain
customer_reviews.author: Ron H

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker for people with flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and have difficulty finding a sneaker. This one fits perfectly and is great for running and work outs.
customer_reviews.author: sgarg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Very comfortable, but consider going up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: betty paul

customer_reviews.title: Sized small
customer_reviews.text: Size is too small compared to other puma I have had
customer_reviews.author: jason collins

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit narrow, can use on a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit narrow, can use on a day basis, but will need to loosen the laces so my feet can breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Miranda

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and stylish. Will buy more of same kind.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Elliott

customer_reviews.title: That Pumas do run small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 13 normally. Those 13 feel like size 12.
customer_reviews.author: micahel jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Size runs a bit smaller than same size i tried on at store
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers, they fit great and I love the look😀
customer_reviews.author: steven mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: They are a comfortable pair of shoes. They easily became the shoes that I wear everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schoen jr

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a very comfortable shoe. The soft insole is useless.
customer_reviews.author: robert d.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Cell Surin 2 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Cell Surin Matte offers a fresh look within the 10cell family. This casual athletic running style offers a lighter, sleeker and modern feel while continuing with the successful heritage look on visible technology. Perfect to wear before, during, and after a workout.
